H0.text: Who allegedly solved the riddle of the Gordian knot simply by slicing it with his sword. Alexander the Great

H1.text: Who allegedly solved the riddle of the Gordian knot simply by slicing it with his sword. Perseus

H2.text: Who allegedly solved the riddle of the Gordian knot simply by slicing it with his sword. Hercules

H3.text: Who allegedly solved the riddle of the Gordian knot simply by slicing it with his sword. Sikunder

A4.text: Alexander proclaimed that it did not matter how the knot was undone, and hacked it apart with his sword.

A5.text: Alexander 'undid' the hitherto unsolvable Gordian Knot.
